_header: The good or evil fortune of all am mans life
Subjects: friends; wives, choice of; marriage, advice on
_description: The choice of friends and a wife — three couplets

DULCosViii9.Transcription:
The good or evell fortune of all a mans lyffeYs in the good or evell
                    chowsinge his frend or his wiffe
DULCosViii9.Note: Lines 1-2 only, added to lower margin.

                Manuscripts.
EETS
         s.s. 19 (2002).
